content.description: Share the starting holds of The Rhino V4, but instead climb out to the right and up to the roof, pulling over an often mossy mantel. Requires some cleaning if the water rises.Â
content.location: The very last boulder in the Atlantis area. After following the cliff line (and walking under the massive roof crack) continue around the corner to a secluded area with one giant "horn shaped" boulder. Start both The Rhino V4 and Rhino Direct V3 on the lowest starting jugs underneath at the base of the steep roof.

content.description: Located right on the lakes edge, this area occasionally gets dunked, but stays shady year round. Can be very cold in winter months. Relatively small area, but holds about 6 routes with a few potential projects. Features "Dancing with the Stars V6 highball," "The Rhino," a fun V4 compression problem, and "Bird's Nest Soup V8," a massive 25 foot roof crack begging for more ascents.
